about_the_game:
Space Miner - Idle Adventures

Space Miner - Idle Adventures is a fun, entertaining and addictive game that lets you explore the galaxy, mine asteroids, and encounter all kinds of crazy events. Whether you want to play casually or actively, this game will keep you hooked!

Features

  • Two ways to actively mine with your ship: Use drills or lasers to mine asteroids of different types and sizes. Drills are cheaper and always get the full mining amount, but you have to chase down the asteroids. Lasers are more expensive and have diminishing returns over distance, but you're not chasing the asteroids. Choose your strategy wisely!
  • Upgrade your ship: Sell the resources you gather for gold, and use the gold to buy upgrades that increase your mining speed and cargo capacity.
  • Perform Research using gathered resources to unlock technological advancements to improve your equipment and more. Over 170 research items so far!
  • Craft unique parts in the Click Factory for advanced research and other craftable feature unlocks like hidden storage and offline rewards.
  • Feel like idling? Buy AutoMiners to gather ore for you in the background. They'll collect ore even while the rest of the game is paused. Buy Merchants (auto-sellers) to sell selected inventory for you automatically! Cha-ching!
  • You can also buy Mining Outposts to mine specific resources.
  • Prefer a more entertaining method of idle mining? Buy Mining Drones that will fly around and mine the asteroids for you. Such a spectacular performance to behold!
  • There are also Player placeable Laser Mining Turrets, for all your Frickin Laser needs.
  • Increase your Reputation (prestige) to earn gold even faster!
  • Explore Space: Encounter various events and zones that may reward you, challenge you, or screw you over. Play Rock Paper Scissors with aliens, roll dice with pirates, shoot the breeze with fellow miners, and uncover the secrets of ancient artifacts and anomalies.
  • Battle bosses to unlock new zones. Once unlocked, you can warp to the new zones for rare loot and events. Scan wrecks, dodge solar flares, navigate mazes and more!
  • Earn achievements: There are over 60 in-game achievements to earn, ranging from easy to hard, and from silly to serious. Some of them may even affect the gameplay or reveal hidden secrets. Can you unlock them all?
  • Complete Quests to earn rewards and earn reputation across the galaxy.
  • Enjoy the humor: The game is full of jokes, puns, references, and Easter eggs that will make you laugh out loud. The game does not take itself too seriously, and neither should you. Just have fun and watch the numbers go UP!
  • Keep your progress on track and synchronized across devices with Cloud Saves and Cross-Platform support. Windows, Linux and yep, Steam Deck!
  • Playtime rewards. Watch for the gifts!

More details
For more details about the current state of the game, updates, and more, check out our Discord.
As this is Early Access, there may be bugs and incomplete features. More features and content are being built and added all the time. The game is in Active development.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64-bit
  • Processor: Any modern x64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Vulkan-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64-bit
  • Processor: Any modern x64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Vulkan-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card

movies.name: Intro Gameplay with mining, shop and encounter

name: Space Miner - Idle Adventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Any modern x64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Vulkan-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Any modern x64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Vulkan-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card

short_description: A casual idle / active-idle asteroid mining game where you fly around mining and make the numbers go UP! Lasers, Drones, a dash of humor, RPG, science, research, crafting, games and more.
